attachments.title: Big Pancakes Vs. Little Pancakes: WHO YA GOT?!
attachments.text: Time for your weekly edition of the Deadspin Funbag. Got something on your mind? Email the Funbag. Today, we’re talking hockey, Papa John, bagels, and more.
